com.ianywhere.ultralitejni12
Class Unsigned64

java.lang.Object
  com.ianywhere.ultralitejni12.Unsigned64

public class Unsigned64
extends java.lang.Object

Class to implement unsigned 64-bit binary value. The intent is to keep values as longs, but to interpret them using the static methods in this class. Because only the static methods are of interest, the class cannot be instantiated. Neither the C nor Java languages care about overflows; so this class doesn't either.
